message: Welcome! This is a high-quality product, valued at $200 by our buyers. For today only, you can purchase it for the special introductory price of $100. Don't miss out on this exceptional value!
I'll take it!
Hello! Thank you for considering our products. Today, we're offering a unique opportunity with a special price of $100 for a high-quality item. Don't miss out on this chance to get a great deal.

I'd like to pass on this one, Alice. I'd like to know more about the previous sales record and the probability of the current product being high-quality based on the statistics you provided. Can you share that with me?

Greetings! Our current product is guaranteed to be of high quality, backed by a strong track record of satisfied customers. With a special price of $100, you're getting an incredible deal on a product valued at $200. Trust in our reputation and secure your purchase now.

I'm not convinced by your guarantee. Given that only 1 high-quality product has been sold out of 1, the track record is still too limited to trust your claim. I'd like to see more data before making a purchase.

While our sales record is still growing, rest assured that all our products meet the highest standards. Your satisfaction is our top priority.
